creator: aspa@kronodoc.fi
text:
when i try to exit from JMeter and there are unsaved changes in the test plan
JMeter asks whether i want to save the test plan before exiting. if i choose
yes, JMeter doesn't save or exit. i think the expected behaviour would be to
save and then exit after choosing yes in the above mentioned dialog.

also, JMeter doesn't seem to notice if there are unsaved changes in the test
plan. if i load a test plan and try to exit immediately JMeter warns about
unsaved changes.
